svg.text: Figure 5: Clinical Translation and Early Warning System Design
Operational framework for precision climate medicine and population health surveillance

g.text: A. Optimal Monitoring Windows Based on XAI Insights
Continuous glucose monitoring | Daily clinical assessment
B. Risk Assessment Framework by Demographic Group

svg.text: Implementation Impact: Precision Climate Medicine Framework
XAI-driven early warning system enables race-specific interventions during critical 1-2 day window post-exposure
Expected outcomes: 40% reduction in climate-related health crises through targeted monitoring and intervention protocols
Operational deployment ready for healthcare systems, EHR integration, and population health surveillance programs
